item.title: Hack The Box: Squashed Writeup | Easy
item.description: Hack The Box: Squashed Writeup Welcome to my detailed writeup of the easy difficulty machine “Squashed” on Hack The Box. This writeup will cover the steps taken to achieve initial foothold and escalation to root. TCP Enumeration $ rustscan -a 10.129.228.109 --ulimit 5000 -g 10.129.228.109 -> [22,80,111,2049,44291,49353,50057,53893] $ nmap -p22,80,111,2049,44291,49353,50057,53893 -sCV 10.129.228.109 -oN allPorts Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-08-05 15:45 CEST Nmap scan report for 10.129.228.109 Host is up (0.
